    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset(org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.ConnectionPool parent,
         org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PooledConnection conn)
        This interceptor has no state to be reset, so this method does nothing.
        Specified by:
        reset in class org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.JdbcInterceptor
        See Also:
        JdbcInterceptor.reset(ConnectionPool, PooledConnection)

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(Map<String,org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PoolProperties.InterceptorProperty> properties)
        Configure the interceptor. The following options are all required :
        • hostname: the hostname of the Statsd server
        • port: the port of the Statsd server
        • sampleRate: the fraction of connections that will be measured
        • prefix: this prefix will be added to the keys published to Statsd
        Overrides:
        setProperties in class org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.JdbcInterceptor

      • invoke

        public Object invoke(Object proxy,
            Method method,
            Object[] args)
              throws Throwable
        Gets invoked each time an operation on Connection is invoked. The timing and count of each method calls to Connection are sent to Statsd.
        Specified by:
        invoke in interface InvocationHandler
        Overrides:
        invoke in class org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.JdbcInterceptor
        Throws:
        Throwable
